document_data.name: Bramas Thorntree
document_data.mainbody: '''Bramas Thorntree''' was a thief and smuggler in [[Tethyr]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Bramas worked for [[Kiros Tamadan]], a spice merchant in [[Athkatla]], who through various agents and blind contacts worked for [[Inselm Hhune]].
document_data.History:
Bramas had  worked for his boss for a long time.

In 1370 DR DR, Bramas was ordered to to gather a mercenary company and recover the ''[[Sondarr Scepter]]'' from a long-forgotten [[dwarven]] tomb in the [[Starspire Mountains]]. He gathered some old allies and mercenaries, forming the [[Company of the Anvil]]. Together they recovered the ''Scepter''.

They were ordered to maintain a low profile in their return voyage and on [[Uktar 10]] they stopped at the [[Blue Badger Inn]] in the village of [[Toralth]] for a drink.

Later that night, three [[Dwarf|dwarves]], [[Bapar Ghalmrin]], [[Odak Truesteel]], and [[Soram Battlebellow]], entered the tavern seeking the ''Sondarr Scepter''. However, the dwarves accidentally started a brawl with the [[Shields of the Highland]] adventuring company. Bramas and his companions used this as an opportunity to escape with the ''Scepter''.
document_data.Personality: Bramas took his work very seriously. He was totally loyal to his masters and always honored a contract. However, he would not follow this duty to the death. Instead, if surrounded by enemies, he falsely surrendered and cooperated with the hope of escaping later. Bramas also enjoyed taunting his vanquished adversaries after the end of a job.
